function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Manually evaluated data quality and interlinking may lead to errors in the OpenKG-COVID19 data.","Impact":"Inaccurate data may result in misguided decisions, misinformed research, and ineffective interventions in the fight against COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Implement automated data quality checks, expert validation, and cross-validation with trusted sources to ensure accuracy.","Technologies":"Data validation algorithms, machine learning for error detection, blockchain for provenance tracking.","People":"Researchers, public health authorities, policymakers, healthcare providers.","Owner":"Platform administrators, data quality experts."},{"Description":"Volunteers committing data corrections may introduce incorrect information into the KG.","Impact":"The introduction of incorrect information could further propagate misinformation and mislead intelligent applications and decision-making.","Mitigation":"Implement strict validation processes for data corrections, provide clear guidelines for reviewing and updating KG data, and employ expert oversight.","Technologies":"Blockchain for audit trail, validation algorithms, machine learning for error detection.","People":"Platform administrators, domain experts, data validators.","Owner":"Platform administrators, domain experts."},{"Description":"Use of blockchain technology for provenance tracking and credit incentive may pose security and privacy risks.","Impact":"Vulnerabilities in the blockchain system could lead to unauthorized access, data tampering, and exposure of sensitive information.","Mitigation":"Implement robust security measures, regular security audits, and privacy-enhancing technologies such as encryption and access control.","Technologies":"Blockchain security protocols, encryption, access control mechanisms.","People":"Developers, security experts, privacy advocates.","Owner":"Platform administrators, security experts."}]}
